featured.title: Portfolio Website
featured.description: A modern developer portfolio built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion. Integrated with MongoDB for dynamic content like timeline and projects.

featured.title: Education Course Management API
featured.description: A scalable backend API to manage courses, instructors, and schedules. Secure role-based authentication with JWT, deployed to Azure with MySQL integration.

featured.title: MoodSync – Wellness Assistant
featured.description: A personalized mental wellness & lifestyle assistant app. Integrates Google Maps, Weather APIs, and Geolocation. Includes Playwright automation tests.

collaborations.title: UpFlux – UX/UI Design
collaborations.description: Contributed to the design of the UpFlux update management platform. Created Figma prototypes and UX flows for dashboards, login pages, and management modules.

collaborations.title: UpFlux – QA Automation
collaborations.description: Developed automated tests for the UpFlux platform using Postman for backend API testing and Playwright in C# for frontend validation. Focused on authentication, access control, and reliability.
collaborations.collaboration: Collaborative project • Role: QA Automation Engineer
